publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2723 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Mental Health (Medical Treatment Subject to Safeguards) (Section 234) (Scotland) Regulations 2005—That the Health Committee recommends that the draft Mental Health (Medical treatment subject to safeguards) (Section 234) (Scotland) Regulations 2005 be approved. Supported by: Rhona Brankin*

S2M-2723 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Mental Health (Medical Treatment Subject to Safeguards) (Section 234) (Scotland) Regulations 2005—That the Health Committee recommends that the draft Mental Health (Medical treatment subject to safeguards) (Section 234) (Scotland) Regulations 2005 be approved. Supported by: Rhona Brankin
